statements:
DELETE FROM DataRetentionPolicy WHERE id = 1;
DELETE FROM DataRetentionPolicy WHERE retention_duration > 365;
DELETE FROM data_logs WHERE log_id = 100 AND policy_id = 1;
DELETE FROM outdated_data WHERE expires_at < NOW();
DELETE FROM retention_policies WHERE id = 101 AND policy_name = 'Policy_A';
DELETE FROM expired_data WHERE expired_date < NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days';
DELETE FROM data_table WHERE data_name = 'Example Data' AND creation_date < TIMESTAMP '2022-01-01';
